resources.string: On the screen there are multiple aspects, including the desired and current temperature, the week program, the status of connection with the thermostat and the day and night temperatures. You can change the desired temperature. The change will be permanent if the week program is diabled, and temporarily (until the next switch), if the week program is enabled. You can also change the day and night temperature and the weekprogram by going to other activities.
If the week program is unchecked the desired temperature will be the temperature until the week program is put on again and the first switch of the week program is reached.

This page allows the changing of the day and night temperature that will be used in the week program. The day and night temperature can be altered by sliding the circular seekbar or by pressing the up and down button next to the circular seekbar. The circular seekbar will allow changing with big steps whereas the buttons can be used to change by + or - 0.1. By holding the up or down button longer it will still only increase by 0.1. If the temperature is changed this will automatically be saved, and will change the temperatures of day and night which are used in the week program.

The week program is a program that allows presets in the temperature changes during the days (monday to sunday) of a week. On this page there is the possibility to set and remove switches and view the day and night temperatures. The week program can be set by setting switches.
